result.markdown:
---
title: "Estimand Specification and Intercurrent Events"
---




| Attribute | Description | Example |
|------------|--------------|----------|
| Population | Who is under study | Adults with diabetes |
| Treatment  | Intervention and comparator | New drug vs standard care |
| Outcome    | Target variable | 12-month mortality |
| Intercurrent Events | Post-randomization events | Treatment switching |
| Summary Measure | Contrast | Risk difference (ATE) |




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(dplyr)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```{.r .cell-code}
trial <- tibble(A = rbinom(200,1,0.5), Y = rbinom(200,1,0.4))
trial %>% summarise(Risk_Treated = mean(Y[A==1]), Risk_Control = mean(Y[A==0]), ATE = diff(c(Risk_Treated, Risk_Control)))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 1 Ã— 3
  Risk_Treated Risk_Control     ATE
         <dbl>        <dbl>   <dbl>
1        0.436        0.358 -0.0777
```
